AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Corporate Property Portfolio

decision_conditions: It is considered that the quality of the  proposed roof slates is not appropriate for the application site and the Fairfield / Knights Park Conservation Area. Furthermore, insufficient information has been submitted with regards to the other elements of the proposal, contrary to Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policy CS8 and Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The submitted architectural detailing plans do not include all architectural features, therefore it is considered that insufficient information has been submitted to ensure satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, contrary to  Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) and Policy DM12 of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Conditions 3 (External Details and Samples) and 4 (Detailed Plans) of planning permission 23/01755/FUL (Erection of 2nos semi-detached dwelling with associated bins, cycle provision and removal of existing drop kerb.)
